jminusminus

? CharReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • jminusminus.CharReader

  • class CharReader
extends java.lang.Object
    A buffered character reader. Abstracts out differences between platforms, mapping all new lines to '\n'. Also, keeps track of line numbers where the first line is numbered 1.
